verses.verse: יְהוָ֤ה <S%H3068><s%> O LORD אֱלֹהַי֙ <S%H430><s%> thou [art] my God אַתָּ֔ה <S%H859><s%> you אֲרֽוֹמִמְךָ֙ <S%H7426><s%> exalt אוֹדֶ֣ה <S%H3034><s%> thee I will praise שִׁמְךָ֔ <S%H8034><s%> thy name כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> for עָשִׂ֖יתָ <S%H6213><s%> for thou hast done פֶּ֑לֶא <S%H6382><s%> wonderful עֵצ֥וֹת <S%H6098><s%> [things thy] counsels מֵֽרָח֖וֹק <S%H7350><s%> of old אֱמ֥וּנָה <S%H530><s%> [are] faithfulness אֹֽמֶן׃ <S%H544><s%> [and] truth

כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for שַׂ֤מְתָּ <S%H7760><s%> For thou hast made מֵעִיר֙ <S%H5892><s%> of a city לַגָּ֔ל <S%H1530><s%> an heap קִרְיָ֥ה <S%H7151><s%> city בְצוּרָ֖ה <S%H1219><s%> [of] a defenced לְמַפֵּלָ֑ה <S%H4654><s%> a ruin אַרְמ֤וֹן <S%H759><s%> a palace זָרִים֙ <S%H2114><s%> of strangers מֵעִ֔יר <S%H5892><s%> to be no city לְעוֹלָ֖ם <S%H5769><s%> it shall never לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> not יִבָּנֶֽה׃ <S%H1129><s%> be built

עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and כֵּ֖ן <S%H3651><s%> after that יְכַבְּד֣וּךָ <S%H3513><s%> glorify עַם־ <S%H5971><s%> people עָ֑ז <S%H5794><s%> Therefore shall the strong קִרְיַ֛ת <S%H7151><s%> thee the city גּוֹיִ֥ם <S%H1471><s%> nations עָרִיצִ֖ים <S%H6184><s%> of the terrible יִירָאֽוּךָ׃ <S%H3372><s%> shall fear

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for הָיִ֨יתָ <S%H1961><s%> have been מָע֥וֹז <S%H4581><s%> For thou hast been a strength לַדָּ֛ל <S%H1800><s%> to the poor מָע֥וֹז <S%H4581><s%> a strength לָאֶבְי֖וֹן <S%H34><s%> to the needy בַּצַּר־ <S%H6862><s%> in his distress ל֑וֹ מַחְסֶ֤ה <S%H4268><s%> a refuge מִזֶּ֙רֶם֙ <S%H2230><s%> from the storm צֵ֣ל <S%H6738><s%> a shadow מֵחֹ֔רֶב <S%H2721><s%> from the heat כִּ֛י <S%H3588><s%> For ר֥וּחַ <S%H7307><s%> when the blast עָרִיצִ֖ים <S%H6184><s%> of the terrible ones כְּזֶ֥רֶם <S%H2230><s%> [is] as a storm קִֽיר׃ <S%H7023><s%> [against] the wall

כְּחֹ֣רֶב <S%H2721><s%> as the heat בְּצָי֔וֹן <S%H6724><s%> in a dry place שְׁא֥וֹן <S%H7588><s%> the noise זָרִ֖ים <S%H2114><s%> of strangers תַּכְנִ֑יעַ <S%H3665><s%> Thou shalt bring down חֹ֚רֶב <S%H2721><s%> [even] the heat בְּצֵ֣ל <S%H6738><s%> with the shadow עָ֔ב <S%H5645><s%> of a cloud זְמִ֥יר <S%H2158><s%> the song עָֽרִיצִ֖ים <S%H6184><s%> of the terrible ones יַעֲנֶֽה׃ <S%H6030><s%> shall be brought low פ

וְעָשָׂה֩ <S%H6213><s%> make יְהוָ֨ה <S%H3068><s%> shall the LORD צְבָא֜וֹת <S%H6635><s%> of hosts לְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> for all הָֽעַמִּים֙ <S%H5971><s%> unto all people בָּהָ֣ר <S%H2022><s%> And in this mountain הַזֶּ֔ה <S%H2088><s%> this מִשְׁתֵּ֥ה <S%H4960><s%> a feast שְׁמָנִ֖ים <S%H8081><s%> of fat things מִשְׁתֵּ֣ה <S%H4960><s%> a feast שְׁמָרִ֑ים <S%H8105><s%> of wines on the lees שְׁמָנִים֙ <S%H8081><s%> of fat things מְמֻ֣חָיִ֔ם <S%H4229><s%> full of marrow שְׁמָרִ֖ים <S%H8105><s%> of wines on the lees מְזֻקָּקִֽים׃ <S%H2212><s%> well refined

וּבִלַּע֙ <S%H1104><s%> And he will destroy בָּהָ֣ר <S%H2022><s%> in this mountain הַזֶּ֔ה <S%H2088><s%> this פְּנֵֽי־ <S%H6440><s%> the face הַלּ֥וֹט ׀ <S%H3875><s%> of the covering הַלּ֖וֹט <S%H3874><s%> cast over עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> is over כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הָֽעַמִּ֑ים <S%H5971><s%> all people וְהַמַּסֵּכָ֥ה <S%H4541><s%> and the vail הַנְּסוּכָ֖ה <S%H5259><s%> that is spread עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> over כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הַגּוֹיִֽם׃ <S%H1471><s%> over all nations

בִּלַּ֤ע <S%H1104><s%> He will swallow up הַמָּ֙וֶת֙ <S%H4194><s%> death לָנֶ֔צַח <S%H5331><s%> in victory וּמָחָ֨ה <S%H4229><s%> will wipe away אֲדֹנָ֧י <S%H136><s%> and the Lord יְהוִ֛ה <S%H3069><s%> GOD דִּמְעָ֖ה <S%H1832><s%> tears מֵעַ֣ל <S%H5921><s%> from כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all פָּנִ֑ים <S%H6440><s%> from off all faces וְחֶרְפַּ֣ת <S%H2781><s%> and the rebuke עַמּ֗וֹ <S%H5971><s%> of his people יָסִיר֙ <S%H5493><s%> shall he take away מֵעַ֣ל <S%H5921><s%> from כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הָאָ֔רֶץ <S%H776><s%> from off all the earth כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> for יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> for the LORD דִּבֵּֽר׃ <S%H1696><s%> hath spoken פ

וְאָמַר֙ <S%H559><s%> And it shall be said בַּיּ֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> in that day הַה֔וּא <S%H1931><s%> he הִנֵּ֨ה <S%H2009><s%> Behold אֱלֹהֵ֥ינוּ <S%H430><s%> Lo this [is] our God זֶ֛ה <S%H2088><s%> this קִוִּ֥ינוּ <S%H6960><s%> we have waited ל֖וֹ וְיֽוֹשִׁיעֵ֑נוּ <S%H3467><s%> for him and he will save זֶ֤ה <S%H2088><s%> This יְהוָה֙ <S%H3069><s%> God קִוִּ֣ינוּ <S%H6960><s%> we have waited ל֔וֹ נָגִ֥ילָה <S%H1523><s%> for him we will be glad וְנִשְׂמְחָ֖ה <S%H8055><s%> and rejoice בִּישׁוּעָתֽוֹ׃ <S%H3444><s%> in his salvation

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for תָנ֥וּחַ <S%H5117><s%> rest יַד־ <S%H3027><s%> shall the hand יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD בָּהָ֣ר <S%H2022><s%> For in this mountain הַזֶּ֑ה <S%H2088><s%> this וְנָ֤דוֹשׁ <S%H1758><s%> shall be trodden down מוֹאָב֙ <S%H4124><s%> and Moab תַּחְתָּ֔יו <S%H8478><s%> his place כְּהִדּ֥וּשׁ <S%H1758><s%> is trodden down מַתְבֵּ֖ן <S%H4963><s%> under him even as straw [בְּמֵי כ] (בְּמֹ֥ו <S%H4325><s%> waste ק) מַדְמֵנָֽה׃ <S%H4087><s%> of a manure

וּפֵרַ֤שׂ <S%H6566><s%> And he shall spread forth יָדָיו֙ <S%H3027><s%> his hands בְּקִרְבּ֔וֹ <S%H7130><s%> in the midst כַּאֲשֶׁ֛ר <S%H834><s%> after יְפָרֵ֥שׂ <S%H6566><s%> spreadeth forth הַשֹּׂחֶ֖ה <S%H7811><s%> of them as he that swimmeth לִשְׂח֑וֹת <S%H7811><s%> [his hands] to swim וְהִשְׁפִּיל֙ <S%H8213><s%> and he shall bring down גַּֽאֲוָת֔וֹ <S%H1346><s%> their pride עִ֖ם <S%H5973><s%> together אָרְבּ֥וֹת <S%H698><s%> together with the spoils יָדָֽיו׃ <S%H3027><s%> of their hands

וּמִבְצַ֞ר <S%H4013><s%> And the fortress מִשְׂגַּ֣ב <S%H4869><s%> of the high fort חוֹמֹתֶ֗יךָ <S%H2346><s%> of thy walls הֵשַׁ֥ח <S%H7817><s%> shall he bring down הִשְׁפִּ֛יל <S%H8213><s%> lay low הִגִּ֥יעַ <S%H5060><s%> [and] bring לָאָ֖רֶץ <S%H776><s%> to the ground עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> even עָפָֽר׃ <S%H6083><s%> [even] to the dust ס
